page.text: $itemName, is the only source of [item name=dilithium_crystal].
The ore can be found beneath Y level of 32 and can only be mined by picks with an iron mining efficiency or above. That includes the [item name=omni_tool] and the [guide name=tritanium_tools].
The normal drop amount is 1 crystal and a maximum of 3 crystals with a maximum Fortune enchantment.
